getImageLoadingPolicy() - Method in class gr.fire.browser.Browser
There are different policies on loading the images of a Page.
- Browser.NO_IMAGES
- Browser.LOAD_IMAGES
- Browser.LOAD_IMAGES_ASYNC (default)
The load LOAD_IMAGES_ASYNC will skip images with preset width and height (as img tag properties) and will try to load them after the Page is done loading.
